items.sentence: Remember when we went on that trip to Boston?
It took Tom over three years to learn French.
Tom didn't expect Mary to rebuff his advance.
I don't think we should trust Tom's judgment.
Don't you think Tom is overdoing it a little?
Nobody knows how long the pandemic will last.
I have no idea why Tom suddenly quit his job.
It looked like Tom was going to start crying.
It looked like Tom was about to start crying.
I just realized we've made a serious mistake.
Tom wasn't the one who gave Mary a black eye.
Tom wasn't the last person to see Mary alive.
Tom wasn't sure Mary knew she had to do that.
Tom wasn't able to take his eyes off of Mary.
Tom was hoping he could go sailing with Mary.
Tom used to go bowling with Mary once a week.
Tom told Mary he was almost ready to do that.
Tom seemed to really enjoy talking with Mary.
Tom isn't the one who wanted Mary to do that.
Tom isn't sure Mary can take care of herself.
